title: Hut 8 Doubles Bitcoin-Backed Loan With Coinbase to $130M, Locks in Lower Rate
description: The amended facility adds $65 million in capital availability and trimmed the interest rate to 9%.
content:
Bitcoin mining firm Hut 8 (HUT) said on Tuesday that it expanded its bitcoin-backed credit facility with Coinbase Credit to $130 million, up from $65 million.
